value.0:
This seems to be the journal of somebody who was staying in this locked room. There is no sign of whoever it was, but maybe the journal can give you some insight. 

Most of the pages are faded or crumbled, but you are able to makeout a few entries:

Day 3 - I managed to surv... .he mon..ers in t.e Mirr.r .aze, and a.ter much trial an. e.ror I fo..d the path through. The famed Electric Castle is no. like i. was des.r.bed. Monst..s are every..ere, and only my sk..lls at hidin. have ke.t me safe. Th.s lo..ed room seem. to be t.e only re.uge in this cursed place.

Day 7 - I've expl.red the res.t of the Mir..r Maze. I stum..ed acros. the str...est shop, full of old junk. it's not t.. trea...e I was promised, though. I've explor.. th.s entire le..l of the castle, the Hall. All exc..t the three pathways. I don't dare enter them until I am s..e of the answ.. to the signs warning. 

Day 17 - Running out of su..lies, but I ..ink I .av. solv.d the thr.e paths. It says to pick the on. th.t be.. r...esent. yo.r soul, and the onl. clu. se.ms to be the coloured lig.ts. I think Red is sa..e for evil-soul.d indi...als, blue f.. those wit. no predilections for g..d or evil, a.d wh.te ..r g.od-hear.ed folk. But, how do.s one know wh..ch th.y are? 

Day 18 - To..ay mark.d the last of my fo.d. I will choose my path, sin.e the ..easure is the wh.le re..one I came to t.is insane place. I wond.r wh.t has beco.e of Ay.. --- wait....I forgot to lock th. doo....--_______

At that point, there is a scribble of ink, and the rest of the page is torn out. There are no further entries in the journal.
